Commentary: cramped for room as he chops this cut that rolls past the keeper
Commentary_short: Nasum Ahmed to Guptill, no run

Commentary: lofted over the infield, hit well but mid-off hares back to throw the ball back in
Commentary_short: Nasum Ahmed to Guptill, 2 runs

Commentary: he's nailed this! Half-tracker deposited deep into the stands at deep midwicket. That was nothing short of a gift
Commentary_short: Nasum Ahmed to Guptill, SIX runs

Commentary: slaps the cut to point
Commentary_short: Nasum Ahmed to Guptill, no run

Commentary: flatter one on middle and leg, punched to square leg
Commentary_short: Nasum Ahmed to Guptill, 1 run

Commentary: ah, not quite. Wallops this short ball straight to cover
Commentary_short: Nasum Ahmed to Allen, no run

Commentary: bangs one in on middle, Guptill tries to make room but doesn't get it, defended into the off side
Commentary_short: Taskin Ahmed to Guptill, no run

Commentary: swung away cleanly over wide long-on! Nearly out of the ground. You only have to hit it 70 metres to clear the ropes, bet you that was close to a 100.
Commentary_short: Taskin Ahmed to Guptill, SIX runs

Commentary: leading edge short of cover. Good change in pace, this was an off-cutter full on the stumps, Guptill was looking to whip this away
Commentary_short: Taskin Ahmed to Guptill, no run

Commentary: goes full and straight, a crime really, as Guptill clears his front leg and belts this down the ground and into the sight screen. As clean as they come
Commentary_short: Taskin Ahmed to Guptill, SIX runs

Commentary: beaten by a sharp bouncer as he was looking to hook this one into the stands
Commentary_short: Taskin Ahmed to Guptill, no run

Commentary: slower and fuller, Guptill backs away and slices this over point for a couple
Commentary_short: Taskin Ahmed to Guptill, 2 runs

Commentary: reverse-swept over point, and guess what? The fielder did all the hard work in giving it chase and ended up scooping the ball over the ropes in trying to pull it back in. Comedy of errors. Shoriful the fielder in question.
Commentary_short: Nasum Ahmed to Allen, FOUR runs

Commentary: fired full on middle and leg, Allen stands still and muscles this away over midwicket, scuppers away to the rope
Commentary_short: Nasum Ahmed to Allen, FOUR runs

Commentary: swung away, no chance for wide long-on. Make that three in a row. He went full outside off, Allen moved across a bit to hammer that away
Commentary_short: Nasum Ahmed to Allen, FOUR runs

Commentary: smashed back, clears the ropes. Into the top tier. Straight hit. Terrific this. Finn has played a reverse, a muscular hoick, a whip and now a straight drill
Commentary_short: Nasum Ahmed to Allen, SIX runs

Commentary: hammered down to long-on, made a clean thwaaaaack as the ball met bat
Commentary_short: Nasum Ahmed to Allen, 1 run

Commentary: inside edge as he tries to slog sweep, good stop at short fine
Commentary_short: Nasum Ahmed to Guptill, 1 run

Commentary: length ball on off, bunts this wide of cover
Commentary_short: Shoriful Islam to Guptill, 1 run

Commentary: beaten by an excellent short ball angling away. Allen was nearly halfway down as he charged down to pull
Commentary_short: Shoriful Islam to Allen, no run

Commentary: difficult chance put down by Rubel running back from mid-off.Allen sliced this slower delivery over mid-off, no power behind it whatsoever. He was looking to absolutely muscle that away.
Commentary_short: Shoriful Islam to Allen, 2 runs

Commentary: full toss and he's belted this back over the bowler's head, one bounce into the boundary. Can't have a field for such bowling unfortunately
Commentary_short: Shoriful Islam to Allen, FOUR runs

Commentary: ah, the ball wasn't more than a few yards away from deep extra cover but he had no chance because this was hit so hard! Length ball, Allen backs away to make room and flay that away. Swung really hard at that
Commentary_short: Shoriful Islam to Allen, FOUR runs

Commentary: this is very, very, high. Dropped again as mid-off and mid-on converge. Soumya the fielder. Not easy with the lowlights but this was a steepler. No one looked like catching that.
Commentary_short: Shoriful Islam to Allen, 1 run

Commentary: scooped over short fine! Fear? What's that asks Allen. <s> Goes all the way too. </s> Nah, one bounce. Incredible
Commentary_short: Rubel Hossain to Allen, FOUR runs

Commentary: he's clobbered this over point. Virender Sehwag would be mighty proud! Makes room, uses the width and slaps that 20 rows back
Commentary_short: Rubel Hossain to Allen, SIX runs

Commentary: mistimes this attempted wallop over long-on, down to the fielder
Commentary_short: Rubel Hossain to Allen, 1 run

Commentary: slower length ball, Guptill reaches out to toe-end this over cover, two more
Commentary_short: Rubel Hossain to Guptill, 2 runs

Commentary: slower length ball on middle, extra bounce, bunted down the ground
Commentary_short: Rubel Hossain to Guptill, 1 run

Commentary: beaten as he was through with this pull too early, had to fetch it from way outside off, didn't help that he'd made a lot of room too
Commentary_short: Rubel Hossain to Allen, no run

Commentary: belted over long-on! Shortish and angling away from around the wicket and Guptill had a free swing at that
Commentary_short: Mahedi Hasan to Guptill, SIX runs

Commentary: swung away over deep backward square! Picked the bones out of that. This was down leg and asking to be hit. All Guptill had to do was lend direction
Commentary_short: Mahedi Hasan to Guptill, SIX runs

Commentary: low full toss but Guptill reaches out and then gets down on one knee to drill this to the extra cover boundary
Commentary_short: Mahedi Hasan to Guptill, FOUR runs

Commentary: same ball - a full toss - same shot but this time there's man at deep cover to take the catch. This was struck well but the fielder had been placed a tad wider specifically for that.
Commentary_short: Mahedi Hasan to Guptill, OUT
Dismissal_text: MJ Guptill c Afif Hossain b Mahedi Hasan 44 (27m 19b 1x4 5x6) SR: 231.57

Commentary: fired full on the pads and Allen tickles it away to beat short fine
Commentary_short: Mahedi Hasan to Allen, FOUR runs

Commentary: squirted down to long-on
Commentary_short: Mahedi Hasan to Allen, 1 run

Commentary: hammered back, Rubel must be thanking his stars that his shin wasn't in the way of that! Allen raises a maiden T20I fifty
Commentary_short: Rubel Hossain to Allen, FOUR runs

Commentary: Soumya puts down another, coming in from long-off. Tough chance though, did all the hard work in haring in and putting in a full-stretch dive but couldn't hold on. Allen was looking to muscle it away but didn't get power as he was cramped for room
Commentary_short: Rubel Hossain to Allen, 1 run

Commentary: flayed that on the up to deep point
Commentary_short: Rubel Hossain to Phillips, 1 run

Commentary: scooped to the left of short fine, couldn't get it fine enough, deep square runs around to cut that off, also couldn't get power because this was a slower delivery
Commentary_short: Rubel Hossain to Allen, 1 run

Commentary: pulls this length ball, for a second it appeared as if he didn't time it as well as he would've liked, but that is a short boundary at deep midwicket
Commentary_short: Rubel Hossain to Phillips, SIX runs

Commentary: flat-batted into the sight screen. The bowler has a puzzled look on his face
Commentary_short: Rubel Hossain to Phillips, SIX runs

Commentary: steps out and whips this down to long-on
Commentary_short: Mahedi Hasan to Allen, 1 run

Commentary: fired full and wide, round-amish from Mahedi, on a Yorker-length, beaten
Commentary_short: Mahedi Hasan to Phillips, no run

Commentary: Phillips gave away his intention of playing a switch hit even before the bowler delivered, this was fired full down leg as a result, toe-ended to long-off
Commentary_short: Mahedi Hasan to Phillips, 1 run

Commentary: slices this wide full toss to deep point, the man in the deep failed to spot the ball, when he finally did, he didn't account for this one spinning away. Oh, dear. Misjudged it completely
Commentary_short: Mahedi Hasan to Allen, FOUR runs

Commentary: full toss on leg and he's swung this deep over cow corner.
Commentary_short: Mahedi Hasan to Allen, SIX runs

Commentary: flicks this to deep square leg
Commentary_short: Mahedi Hasan to Allen, 1 run

Commentary: flat-batted down to long-on, from way outside off
Commentary_short: Shoriful Islam to Allen, 1 run

Commentary: yorker-length and he's drilled this straight to mid-off, good catch from Soumya. Couldn't get underneath the length to get the elevation and toe-ended it.
Commentary_short: Shoriful Islam to Phillips, OUT
Dismissal_text: GD Phillips c Soumya Sarkar b Shoriful Islam 14 (13m 6b 0x4 2x6) SR: 233.33

Commentary: excellent short ball into the rib-cage, he fends it away into the leg side for a single
Commentary_short: Shoriful Islam to Mitchell, 1 run

Commentary: swung away, one bounce into the wide long-on boundary. Stepped out again to meet this length ball with the middle of the bat
Commentary_short: Shoriful Islam to Allen, FOUR runs

Commentary: short ball angling away, Allen backs away and swings. Goes a mile high, Shoriful runs to his right to try and take a return catch but bails out in the end. That's a fourth catch missed
Commentary_short: Shoriful Islam to Allen, 2 runs

Commentary: goes full and wide, Allen looks to squeeze that away behind point but is beaten, umpire deems it to be too wide
Commentary_short: Shoriful Islam to Allen, 1 wide

Commentary: drilled back, good stop off his own bowling. Ouch, that will hurt.
Commentary_short: Shoriful Islam to Allen, no run

Commentary: slower, fuller and Mitchell backs away to drill this over the bowler's head. Held his shape just for a split-second before going big
Commentary_short: Taskin Ahmed to Mitchell, FOUR runs

Commentary: mistimes this full toss down to wide long-on, sharp work from Naim
Commentary_short: Taskin Ahmed to Mitchell, 2 runs

Commentary: slower length ball angling in, he was looking to swing this into the leg side but ended up getting an inside-edge onto the pads, they scamper a single
Commentary_short: Taskin Ahmed to Mitchell, 1 run

Commentary: top-edges this attempted scoop and an excellent innings comes to an end. Taskin holds his length back by trying a knuckleball, Allen walked across to play the ramp but because there was pace off, got it off a thick edge. But what an innings, what a knock.
Commentary_short: Taskin Ahmed to Allen, OUT
Dismissal_text: FH Allen c sub (Mehidy Hasan Miraz) b Taskin Ahmed 71 (51m 29b 10x4 3x6) SR: 244.82

Commentary: pulled to deep midwicket, they will hare back for two
Commentary_short: Taskin Ahmed to Mitchell, 2 runs

Commentary: reaches out to squeeze this Yorker-length delivery to cover, chancing a second in the hope that the fielders are caught napping, sadly not. In comes the throw to the keeper and Mitchell is out.
Commentary_short: Taskin Ahmed to Mitchell, 1 run, OUT
Dismissal_text: DJ Mitchell run out (Mosaddek Hossain/†Liton Das) 11 (11m 6b 1x4 0x6) SR: 183.33

Commentary: heaves on the leg side first ball and he's off the mark
Commentary_short: Southee to Mohammad Naim, 1 run

Commentary: pitched up just a little bit and Soumya has swung that nicely to send that flying left of mind-on for four on his first ball
Commentary_short: Southee to Soumya Sarkar, FOUR runs

Commentary: slower ball this time and same result! Much slower and straighter and he sends that back straighter as well, right over the bowler's head
Commentary_short: Southee to Soumya Sarkar, FOUR runs

Commentary: frees his arms and clears the in-field yet again, two this time over the cover point region
Commentary_short: Southee to Soumya Sarkar, 2 runs

Commentary: appeal for caught behind, the umpires get together and refer it upstairs, and the soft signal is out. On the pads from Southee, Soumya was flicking it away on the leg side and he got an inside edge before the ball lobbed off the pads back towards the bowler. The third umpire is also checking if the return catch was clean from Southee, who had to dive forward. The catch is clean, Southee's fingers are under the ball, and it's out!
Commentary_short: Southee to Soumya Sarkar, OUT
Dismissal_text: Soumya Sarkar c & b Southee 10 (4m 4b 2x4 0x6) SR: 250.00

Commentary: two in two, the captain is gone for a first ball duck! Scrambled seam from Southee, nice and full on the off stump, Liton tries an unorthodox paddle by doing a long way across and misses it to lose his stumps
Commentary_short: Southee to Liton Das, OUT

Commentary: 138.8kmh, straight and full on the off stump and that's dispatched back over the bowler's head for six. Spotted the length early and struck that well off the middle
Commentary_short: Milne to Mohammad Naim, SIX runs

Commentary: it's short but on the off side and this time Naim ramps it with a flick of the wrists for another six! Waits for it on the back foot, uses his wrists and sends it flying over third man
Commentary_short: Milne to Mohammad Naim, SIX runs

Commentary: 120.2kmh, takes the pace off and beats Naim who is early into the shot and gets an inside edge that rolls towards the keeper
Commentary_short: Milne to Mohammad Naim, no run

Commentary: 122.2kmh, slower and short of length again, looked like a cutter and it rises on Naim who pushes it down the ground
Commentary_short: Milne to Mohammad Naim, no run

Commentary: short of length again, just outside off and he finds extra cover
Commentary_short: Milne to Mohammad Naim, no run

Commentary: 114.8kmh, slower to end the over as well, and there might have been an edge to the keeper. Was there an edge, did it carry, it's gone upstairs again and the soft signal is not out. Replays confirm that didn't carry cleanly, so Naim survives
Commentary_short: Milne to Mohammad Naim, no run

Commentary: Full and straight to Shanto, the pace beats the batsman but he gets one off the inside edge
Commentary_short: Ferguson to Najmul Hossain Shanto, 1 run

Commentary: 118.5kmh, the slower one does't work for Ferguson the way it did for Milne. Slow and full, Naim picks the lack of pace and swings that back over the bowler's head for four
Commentary_short: Ferguson to Mohammad Naim, FOUR runs

Commentary: 143kmh, on length and he drills it down to long-on for one
Commentary_short: Ferguson to Mohammad Naim, 1 run

Commentary: 145.4kmh, that's a mean and quick bouncer. Shanto pulls but can't  get back on it
Commentary_short: Ferguson to Najmul Hossain Shanto, no run

Commentary: on length on the off stump and Shanto gets a single by driving it down to mid-off
Commentary_short: Ferguson to Najmul Hossain Shanto, 1 run

Commentary: driven down to mid-off again off length and a single to end the over
Commentary_short: Ferguson to Mohammad Naim, 1 run

Commentary: starts with the wrong'un and beats him outside off
Commentary_short: Astle to Mohammad Naim, no run

Commentary: almost cleans him up! Length delivery on leg and another wrong'un, Naim sweeps and misses and nearly loses his stumps
Commentary_short: Astle to Mohammad Naim, no run

Commentary: finds long-on this time and Astle gets a wicket. The third googly in a row from Astle, he knew Naim was going to go after it and the length was apt. Naim swung and could only hole out to long-on where Chapman took a good catch diving forward
Commentary_short: Astle to Mohammad Naim, OUT
Dismissal_text: Mohammad Naim c Chapman b Astle 19 (17m 13b 1x4 2x6) SR: 146.15

Commentary: just over a leaping backward point! Shanto scythed the ball outside off, the fielder at point leapt to his right but the ball just about beat him, and Sodhi chases the ball to the third man boundary where, bizarrely, he slides on his leg leg and then pulls the ball back with the back of his left arm/elbow. The third umpire is checking if his leg was touching the rope at the same time. It's very close and it's been given a four, looked like the leg touched the rope when his finger tips were still on the ball
Commentary_short: Astle to Afif Hossain, FOUR runs

Commentary: sneaks through with an inside edge as he comes down, nearly yorks himself and the edge goes past the keeper to the fine leg region
Commentary_short: Astle to Najmul Hossain Shanto, 2 runs

Commentary: the wrong'un has done it, and Shanto is bowled! Second wicket in the over as Shanto went for the pull but he was deceived by the lack of pace and lost his middle stump. He'll regret missing this long hop
Commentary_short: Astle to Najmul Hossain Shanto, OUT
Dismissal_text: Najmul Hossain Shanto  b Astle 8 (15m 6b 1x4 0x6) SR: 133.33

Commentary: Afif comes down to take the ball on the full and chips it down to long off
Commentary_short: Phillips to Afif Hossain, 1 run

Commentary: pushes the ball into the covers for one
Commentary_short: Phillips to Mosaddek Hossain, 1 run

Commentary: misses the big swing outside off and Conway has appealed for a stumping here. Very smart work from Conway to flick the bails off with his right hand as Afif was in his follow through, unaware of how close his back foot was from being outside the crease. The heel is in the air, and it's completely clear if any part of his foot is behind the line or not. The third umpire is checking different angles. Benefit of the doubt goes to the batsman because there might have been something behind the line, so Afif survives
Commentary_short: Phillips to Afif Hossain, no run

Commentary: On the pads and he misses the sweep
Commentary_short: Phillips to Afif Hossain, no run

Commentary: Dances down and gets a single to long-on
Commentary_short: Phillips to Afif Hossain, 1 run

Commentary: Full and straight, he swings hard and high down the ground and just about clears long off for six
Commentary_short: Phillips to Mosaddek Hossain, SIX runs

Commentary: too short on the leg side and that's been punished with a back-foot swivel-pull to the long-leg boundary for six
Commentary_short: Astle to Afif Hossain, SIX runs

Commentary: slower through the air and beats him outside off. Oh, and this time Conway is very confident about the stumping. Flicks the bail off and runs away in celebration. Afif missed the sweep, heel of the back foot in the air and it's not as close as the appeal in the last over. Nothing behind the line and he's out
Commentary_short: Astle to Afif Hossain, OUT
Dismissal_text: Afif Hossain st †Conway b Astle 8 (13m 6b 0x4 1x6) SR: 133.33

Commentary: slider towards the stumps, beaten on the back foot
Commentary_short: Astle to Mahedi Hasan, no run

Commentary: holes out to deep midwicket, the easiest of catches for Phillips in the deep. Flattish length outside off, Mahedi couldn't get under it properly and swept the ball to the leg side but hardly got the distance even on this small ground
Commentary_short: Astle to Mahedi Hasan, OUT
Dismissal_text: Mahedi Hasan c Phillips b Astle 0 (1m 2b 0x4 0x6) SR: 0.00

Commentary: flat and quick outside off, he steers it towards third man for one
Commentary_short: Astle to Mosaddek Hossain, 1 run
Astle to Shoriful Islam, no run

Commentary: full toss on leg, and it's pushed down to long on for one where Chapman dives to his left and parries the ball to long off
Commentary_short: Milne to Mosaddek Hossain, 1 run

Commentary: he just clears long-on, and gets six! Slow and back of length knuckle ball on leg stump, Shoriful cleared his front foot and got just enough distance to swing that over long on
Commentary_short: Milne to Shoriful Islam, SIX runs

Commentary: full and quick, another swing from Shoriful but he's bowled this time. Bangladesh are crumbling here. This was close to 140kmh, full on the base of the leg stump and goes under the bat
Commentary_short: Milne to Shoriful Islam, OUT

Commentary: 138.7kmh, wide yorker this time. Taskin tries to get some bat on it but misses
Commentary_short: Milne to Taskin Ahmed, no run

Commentary: almost in the black hole outside off, Taskin clears his front foot this time and drives it just past a diving mid-off for four
Commentary_short: Milne to Taskin Ahmed, FOUR runs

Commentary: full and on the stumps, Taskin drives it down to long on
Commentary_short: Milne to Taskin Ahmed, 1 run

Commentary: Slower ball at 123kmh from the back of the hand, but the target is the same: the stumps. Full and straight, Taskin wants to swing it away but he's deceived by the pace and loses his stumps
Commentary_short: Ferguson to Taskin Ahmed, OUT

Commentary: 140.3kmh, full and quick, just outside the off stump in the block hole and Rubel can't get any bat on it
Commentary_short: Ferguson to Rubel Hossain, no run

Commentary: Pulls the length back this time and Rubel slaps it to extra cover for a quick single
Commentary_short: Ferguson to Rubel Hossain, 1 run

Commentary: 139.8kmh, quick and down the leg side for a wide
Commentary_short: Ferguson to Mosaddek Hossain, 1 wide

Commentary: a full toss this time and it's pushed down to long off for one
Commentary_short: Ferguson to Mosaddek Hossain, 1 run

Commentary: he backs away and Ferguson follows him with a back of length ball, worked down towards long on for one
Commentary_short: Ferguson to Rubel Hossain, 1 run

Commentary: 117.7kmh, slower than many of his slower balls, it's back of length so Mosaddek waits and then steers it to third man
Commentary_short: Ferguson to Mosaddek Hossain, 1 run

Commentary: targets the top of off stump with this nicely bowled knuckle ball, and Mosaddek chops it late to get two behind square on the off side
Commentary_short: Southee to Mosaddek Hossain, 2 runs

Commentary: another knuckle ball, this time Mosaddek swings on the off side and sends that high before Will Young runs back and dives with perfect timing to get both hands to it
Commentary_short: Southee to Mosaddek Hossain, OUT
Dismissal_text: Mosaddek Hossain c Young b Southee 13 (25m 8b 0x4 1x6) SR: 162.50

Commentary: another slower ball - just 98.3kmh - and beats him on the off side with a full delivery
Commentary_short: Southee to Rubel Hossain, no run

Commentary: 130kmh this time, Rubel gets bat on it this time but he finds extra cover
Commentary_short: Southee to Rubel Hossain, no run

Commentary: 104.9kmh, another slower ball, this one is short and he pulls it for one
Commentary_short: Southee to Rubel Hossain, 1 run

Commentary: almost in the block hole, and he digs it out on the off side past mid-off for one
Commentary_short: Southee to Nasum Ahmed, 1 run

Commentary: on length on off, he cross-bats it to leg for two
Commentary_short: Phillips to Nasum Ahmed, 2 runs

Commentary: 103.4kmh, angling in from around the wicket, he sweeps and misses to take it on the body
Commentary_short: Phillips to Nasum Ahmed, no run

Commentary: that's it, Bangladesh are all out in under 10 overs and New Zealand pocket the series 3-0. Full outside off, and Nasum skies it for an easy catch to extra cover
Commentary_short: Phillips to Nasum Ahmed, OUT
Dismissal_text: Nasum Ahmed c Southee b Phillips 3 (5m 4b 0x4 0x6) SR: 75.00
